title: CI/CD Pipeline: Intelligent E2E Testing with Caching
description:
Build a CI/CD pipeline that runs E2E tests intelligently:

**Goals:**
- Run Playwright E2E tests in CI (GitHub Actions)
- Intelligent test selection based on changed files
- Aggressive caching (deps, Playwright browsers, build artifacts)
- Turbo remote caching integration
- Parallel test execution across shards
- Test result artifacts (traces, screenshots on failure)

**Key Decisions Needed:**
- Turbo remote cache provider (Vercel vs self-hosted)
- Test sharding strategy
- When to run full suite vs affected tests only
- Preview deployment integration (test against Vercel previews?)

**Reference:**
- Turborepo CI patterns
- Playwright GitHub Actions setup
- Vercel preview deployments
